title: Atala PRISM DID Mass-Scale Adoption
description: What type of solutions can drive mass-scale adoption of DID usage as an easy-to-use onramp to the Cardano ecosystem?
importance: Atala PRISM DID is a gateway to the Cardano blockchain and ecosystem. Building technology and marketecture that on-boards users is crucial.
success: Many high quality ideas will be proposed that can substantially grow Cardano's user-base, network-utility, network-value & ADA circulation.
